title: Rio and Kate Ferdinand burst with joy as they share behind-the-scenes snaps from their wedding
text:

Rio and Kate Ferdinand have delighted fans by unveiling even more behind-the-scenes moments from their lavish wedding ceremony which took place in Turkey last month.

The 40-year-old football legend swapped vow with former TOWIE star Kate, 28, in front of friends and family in the sunshine as they became husband and wife.

Cleary still feeling in the wedding spirit, the happy couple have shared even more photos and videos from their celebrations, taking to Instagram on Monday to share scenes from a pre-wedding brunch.

In footage and photography, both Rio and Kate can be seen wearing his and hers white outfits while they danced, drank, ate and laughed together.

(Image: Instagram)

“Reminiscing on the best brunch with our family & friends,” Kate wrote on Instagram as she took a walk down memory lane and shared a string of dazzling photos.

Both Kate and Rio showcased beaming smiles as they posed with friends, family, and each other as they partied in the sunshine.

Kate stunned in a strapless white dress, while Rio showcased his masculine cleavage as he posed in a loose fitting white outfit.

(Image: xkateferdinand/ Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The couple and their family and friends all looked in high spirits as they enjoyed each others’ company while drinks flowed and a delicious array of meats were displayed.

Further photos showed Kate and Rio gazing lovingly at each other and breaking into laughter as the held each other while a band played beside them.

Highlighting he high spirited moment, Kate captioned the photo: “Private joke,” alongside a rolling-on-the-floor-while-crying-with-laughter emoji and a heart eyed emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: xkateferdinand/ Instagram)

Rio himself got involved in the celebratory sharing as he posted a video of himself helping prepare a slab of cooked meat while the gathered crowds cheered loudly.

Rio’s children joined the couple for their big day and all the celebrations surrounding it.

Eldest son Lorenz, 13, his younger brother Tate, 11, eight-year-old daughter Tia, were all there.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Sharing a photo of his daughter with Kate (and obscuring Tia’s face with an emoji), the footballer described the two women in his life as his queen and his princess.

Rio previously revealed how emotion fuelled his wedding day was, telling OK! magazine that he was so overcome with joy that he burst into tears.

“I cried as soon as the day started. Seeing Tia walk up the aisle before Kate set me off. It was just so emotional,” he said.

"There was just no going back on the emotion, that’s why I had to keep my shades on,” he continued.

"Seeing Tate and Lorenz walk Kate down the aisle was particularly poignant and we wouldn’t have wanted to do it any other way. They were so proud and they couldn’t wait to do that, they felt important,” he added.
description: The happy couple became husband and wife at a luxury hotel in Turkey at the end of last month while surrounded by friends and family
